item.description:
DECEMBER'S EVENT HAD A LARGE NUMBER OF NO SHOWS.  MANY FOLKS WERE ON THE WAIT LIST AND YOUR LACK OF CONSIDERATION DID NOT ALLOW MORE TO ATTEND.  IF YOU WERE A NO SHOW, YOU WILL BE PUT ON THE WAIT LIST AND INFORMED THE DAY OF IF THERE IS ROOM TO ADD YOU.

This has been a favorite of the hiking group for the last couple of years.  We get together at my condo club house and enjoy an evening of games and great food brought by all of you. This is a fun way to break up the long nights and to socialize with other hikers. This event will be held at Janice's condo complex clubhouse in South Windsor. We'll have a large fireplace with fire, music, tables & chairs, bathrooms, and full kitchen available.

 Games:

Some of the games we have already: * Pictionary * Picture Picture * Worst Case Scenario * Trivial Pursuit * Scrabble * Fact or Crap * Jenga (well a knockoff version) We'd like to see someone bring these as well as anything else: * Bolderdash * Cranium * Cards (for various card games) Bring any other game you might think 4 - 6 people at least could play at the same time. Team games would be great too. Note this is an indoor game night. We are not doing horseshoes or lawn darts!

Food:

Supplied already: * Paper and serving items. Please plan to bring to share any of: * Finger food * Snacks * Small entree (plan to feed 8 people!) * Drinks

Hall Rental Donation, We would appreciate donations of $5 each person to help offset the cost of the hall rental. Donations will be made at the event so be prepared with cold hard cash.

The address will be sent to those who respond "Yes" a day before the event. Party directions and information will be sent out the day before to those attending. There is always movement those last couple of days with RSVPs so make a decision early. Limitation on RSVP's is due to parking limitations. We all hope you can attend and enjoy a warm evening with great people. Last year this was a hit with over 60 people going each time and people brought great food and drinks to share! If you RSVP "yes" and later can't go, please remember to change your RSVP so someone else can go!!

This is also a celebration for my birthday and so many great folks have been thoughtful enough to give me lovely gifts.  If you are in that frame of mind (sorry if I sound tacky......) a REI gift card would be lovely.  There are a pair of hiking boots that I am saving my pennies for................

Also Snow Rebels will be on sale again.  These fleece lined scarves are fierce face protection for many winter activiites.  It something I am creating.
item.how_to_find_us: Directions will be sent out the day before the event

item.name: Game Night and Janice's Birthday event
